description: Sourced from an established Italian mill, this shirt's Egyptian cotton fabric is specially woven to achieve a fine, silky texture.
fitting_details: Size 15½ has a 31½" back body length, an 18¾" shoulder, a 43" chest, and a 35½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Buttoned placket. Last buttonhole is stitched horizontally for a superior hold. Genuine mother-of-pearl buttons.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Split pleated back yoke ensures smooth, contoured shoulders.
